name: js-error-remote-logger
description: Provides remote logging for JS errors from user's browser by sending a post request to developer specified api endpoint.

scripts.build: babel src/jserl.js --out-dir dist && uglifyjs dist/jserl.js -o dist/jserl.min.js -c -m --ie8
